titleStmt.title: Meditations of the whole historie of the Passion of Christ. Written by the Reuerend Father, F. Franciscus Costerus, Doctor of Diuinity, of the Society of Iesus. Translated out of Latine into English by R.W. Esquire
De universa historia Dominicae Passionis meditationes quinquaginta. English
titleStmt.author: Coster, Franciscus, 1532-1619.
Worthington, Lawrence.

notesStmt.note: A translation, actually by Lawrence Worthington, of: Coster, Franciscus. De universa historia Dominicae Passionis meditationes quinquaginta.
Place of publication, printer and actual translator's name from STC.
Running title reads: Meditations of the Passion of Christ.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
